meanings.definition: Convert a compound into an epimer.
meanings.sent1: I will epimerize this molecule to create its epimer.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often epimerize compounds in the lab for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chemist epimerize the solution? To make it more interesting!
meanings.sent4: Her ability to epimerize compounds is like a magician transforming a rabbit into a hat.
meanings.sent5: The process of epimerization can be compared to flipping a pancake to change its shape.

meanings.sent1: The compound will epimerize under specific conditions.
meanings.sent2: During the reaction, the molecules will epimerize naturally.
meanings.sent3: The solution decided to epimerize itself just for fun!
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the compound began to epimerize like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The ability of molecules to epimerize is a fascinating chemical phenomenon.
